body_html:
I was able to resolve this by rolling back my tf, keras, cuda, cuDNN versions to the following:

  • tensorflow-gpu == 1.4.0
  • keras == 2.0.8
  • CUDA == 8.0
  • cuDNN == 6.0

I'm just wondering if this is expected? Is it that my geforce 770 GPU is not supported in more recent versions of tensorflow with more recent versions of CUDA?
body_text:

I'm just wondering if this is expected?  Is it that my geforce 770 GPU is not supported in more recent versions of tensorflow with more recent versions of CUDA?
body:
I was able to resolve this by rolling back my tf, keras, cuda, cuDNN versions to the following:
* tensorflow-gpu == 1.4.0
* keras == 2.0.8
* CUDA == 8.0
* cuDNN == 6.0

I'm just wondering if this is expected?  Is it that my geforce 770 GPU is not supported in more recent versions of tensorflow with more recent versions of CUDA?
